## [Hongsup Shin](https://www.linkedin.com/in/hongsupshin/)
Hongsup is the organizer of the Austin ML Journal Club. He organizes the club meetings, and maintains the blog and the journal club GitHub repository. 

He is a Principal ML Research Engineer at Arm and used to be a volunteer data scientist at Texas Justice Initiative, a criminal justice non-profit in Austin, TX. His background is computational neuroscience and behavioral ecology. He is interested in **ML Ops and responsible/ethical AI**.
